info.name: Pixiv.net - Grey Blue
info.description:
Mostly a color edit.

Definitely not bright, but not too dark either, and maybe a little boring.  Removes the footer and a few advertisements.

This style is concerned with the main site (illustrations), everything else is of low priority.  Made with Firefox in mind - this style has lax support for Chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
If my style doesn't suffice as an ad hider, I recommend style 25182 for what probably is the ultimate Pixiv clutter killer. Try out my other Pixiv style as well - style 36638. Gray Grey Blue darken dark ================ 2014-09-30
  • Colored background and controls @ RTL Manga pages
2014-06-23
  • Fixed various link colors.
  • Removed legacy support of -moz prefixed box-shadow and border-radius properties
  • Code formatting.
2013-10-18
  • Styled the "Read More" button on long descriptions
2013-10-07
  • Styled the new configuration dropdown menu.
  • Fixed the load more button @ illust. recommend pages.
2013-07-30
  • Removed Suggested User box at home page
  • Added attempt to remove premium promotion box at illust. pages.
  • Added negative text-indent to magnifying glass to hide text
  • Code maintenance: change few element selectors to lowercase.
2013-04-23
  • Repaired buttons and other miscellany.
2012-12-13
  • Remove new tag styling, recolored works page container.
2012-10-03
  • Fixed the tag area at illust. pages.
  • Added some basic support for Google Chrome, for objects that use gradients.
2012-05-29
  • Added .premium to things to be removed

  • Some other stuff I forget.
2012-05-19

  • Styled ASIDE elements at homepage.
2012-04-11
  • Fix simple mistake (used #contents instead of #page-group #contents)
2012-04-08
  • Styled page @ groups.
  • Removed (all?) features requiring Premium subscription.
2012-03-30

  • fixed some width misalignment issues.
2012-01-24

  • trying out a different way to hide left area ads based on #touch_introduction - Consequently removed some code.
2011-11-18
  • Minor fixes.
2011-11-16
  • More styling. Oh yeah, I can feel the bloat now.
2011-11-15

2011-11-14

2011-10-17

  • If you want to remove Halloween logo insert #logoMap {display: none }
2011-09-29
  • Mypage fixes.
2011-09-06
  • Various fixes.
2011-09-01
  • Set opacity: 1 to fix "hidden" image thumbnails when using AutoPager. For your AutoPager rule, Under Advanced > Lazy load image src attribute, set value to "data-src" without quotes.
